references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel 3D Gaussian splatting method for real-time rendering, which is directly adopted and extended in this work for creating high-fidelity human avatars.

references.paper_title: SMPL: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper introduces the SMPL model, a widely used body model for representing human body shape and pose, which is used as a base for the avatar representation in this work.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP is used in this work for semantic understanding and improving the quality of the generated pseudo labels for the avatar

references.paper_title: Portrait4d-v2: Pseudo multi-view data creates better 4d head synthesizer
references.reason: This paper provides a method for generating high-quality 3D face animation from a single image, which is used for generating pseudo-labels for the head in this work.

references.paper_title: Animate anyone: Consistent and controllable image-to-video synthesis for character animation
references.reason: This paper proposes a pose-guided image-to-video diffusion model, which is leveraged in this work to generate pseudo-videos for driving the avatar animation and improving generalization to novel gestures and expressions.
